name: subgraph
description:
the idea graph is the world; it is literally everything ever
a concrete subgraph represents section of the world we want to focus on
an inconcrete subgraph is a set of search criteria

we can use subgraph.search to map our inconcrete subgraph onto the idea graph (find a section of the world)
we can use subgraph.match to map our inconcrete subgraph onto a concrete subgraph (mostly for transforms and imagination)
